Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz704.png'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Is everyone ready? Hold your neighbors tight and keep the children close. We're moving now to the Southern Diocese."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "If we do not live within God's reach, then I will bring us all to where God can see us."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Even if our prayers are unheard, and salvation never comes, I do not intend to merely sit and wait—'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Everyone will be saved... I'll protect you all, until the end."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'So, let us move.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "(Please wait for me, Father Snow, I will bring them all to the eastern diocese, then I'll be returning to the church...)"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory54.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'On the hazy snowy horizon, the outline of the travelers could be seen getting closer and closer, only leaving a trail of footsteps behind them.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Stay together, everyone! Let me know if anyone is feeling unwell.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Careful!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child', 3: 'Sister! Is that... the army?'}
{2: '(Commotion)', 3: "It is! It's the army! We're saved! Thank God we're saved!"}
{2: '(Commotion)', 3: "What's that in the back?! A Corrupted?! How could this be?!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Civilians sighted! There are Corrupted behind! Stay in formation! Protect the civilians!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Commotion)', 3: 'Quick, everyone! Run toward the army!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '... Please lend me a weapon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "You're... A nun? I suppose you've never held a gun before, then... You'll be safer if you just stay in the back...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '... Please lend me a weapon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Alright! Here! A gun!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'God, I ask for your forgiveness for the sins I am about to commit...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Be prepared to atone for your sins, for I shall be your judgment!', 4: '1'}
